text: Vladimir Voronin (; born May 25, 1941) is a Moldovan politician. He was the third President of Moldova from 2001 until 2009 and has been the First Secretary of the Party of Communists of the Republic of Moldova (PCRM) since 1994. He was Europe's first democratically elected communist party head of state after the end of the Eastern Bloc. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Moldova
title: Vladimir Voronin
